title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Developing Strategies for Communicating Biochemistry and Molecular Biology Concepts to the Public

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Develop ≥2 communication strategies to effectively convey biochemistry and molecular biology concepts to diverse audiences

Within one week, learners can analyze one scientific paper related to a designated AI project type (natural language processing or computer vision), extract core content (research purpose, methodology, results, limitations), and reconstruct it into a 500±50-character news release or educational material. The submission must meet two or more of the three rubric criteria (clarity, accuracy, readability).
Explain core principles of scientific communication through iterative improvement of communication outputs based on feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
